name: A few hours later and I'm up-and-running. At home, where signal is patchy, I now get "O2 WiFiCall" in the top bar of my iPhone 7.
author: https://barryfrost.com/

content.html: A few hours later and I'm up-and-running. At home, where signal is patchy, I now get "O2 WiFiCall" in the top bar of my iPhone 7.
